description: 玩家發動的普通攻擊。
name: 攻擊
note:
<setup action>
clear battle log
</setup action>
<target action>
if BattleManager._subject.isActor() && BattleManager._subject.weapons().length===2
    IMMORTAL: targets, true 
    move user: target, front base, 12, auto offset x +15
    wait for movement
    motion attack: user
    motion wait: user
    attack animation: target
    wait for animation
    Motion Damage: Target
    action effect
    wait for effect
    add state 26: user 
    IMMORTAL: targets, false
    motion attack: user
    motion wait: user
    attack animation: target
    wait for animation
    Motion Damage: Target
    action effect
    wait for effect
    remove state 26: user
  else
    move user: target, front base, 12, auto offset x +15
    wait for movement
    motion attack: user
    motion wait: user
    attack animation: target
    wait for animation
    Motion Damage: Target
    action effect
    wait for effect
  end
perform finish
</target action>

name: 防禦
note:

description: 玩家發動的普通攻擊。
name: 攻擊(備份)
note:
<setup action>
</setup action>
<target action>
if BattleManager._subject.isActor() && BattleManager._subject.weapons().length===2
    IMMORTAL: targets, true 
    move user: target, front base, 12, auto offset x +15
    wait for movement
    motion attack: user
    motion wait: user
    attack animation: target
    wait for animation
    action effect
    wait for effect
    add state 26: user
    motion attack: user
    motion wait: user
    attack animation: target
    wait for animation
    action effect
    wait for effect
    remove state 26: user
    COLLAPSE: target,
  else
    move user: target, front base, 12, auto offset x +15
    wait for movement
    motion attack: user
    motion wait: user
    attack animation: target
    wait for animation
    action effect
    wait for effect
    COLLAPSE: target,
   end
clear battle log
perform finish
</target action>

name: 二刀流判斷公式-參考
note:
<target action>
if BattleManager._subject.isActor() && BattleManager._subject.weapons().length===2
    eval: BattleManager._subject.forceAction(14);BattleManager.forceAction(BattleManager._subject);
  else
    action animation
    wait for animation
    action effect
    wait for effect
  end
</target action>
